biotools.summary: PRISM (Poisson RNA-profile Identification in Scaled Mixtures) is statistical framework that allows simultaneous extraction of a tumor sample composition and cell type and sample specific whole-transcriptome profiles from individual bulk RNA-seq samples, by exploiting single-cell reference data. This facilitates a separate analysis of cancer cell and the microenvironment phenotypes and of the tumor composition.
